overview: Halle White has never fit in, especially not with her religious foster family. After being pressured to organize a bachelorette for her ungrateful foster sister, she is pushed to the edge of an emotional breakdown and turns to an unusual support counselor for guidance. What happens next will take Halle on a journey of transformation that will ultimately bring her the one thing she has always desired: a family that truly loves and accepts her.
title: The Turning
